resources.string: No credentials set, give Thingsee username and password
Invalid username/password or no connection to Thingsee, give Thingsee username and password
In this application, you are able to check the various altitudes of which you have reached during your hike, the distance you have travelled from home, and the status of the battery.

Please note that while the Distance Tracker does not provide direction, it is to be used as an emergency tool in the case that you become lost and need to know your address/coordinates as well as the amount of kilometers you are from your designated home location.

We are aware that this app needs improvement. While this may only be the prototype stage, we hope in the future that the application can be further developed into a useful, versatile tool. Thank you for downloading!
Welcome to the Hiking portion of this application
